summary: Notification of establishment of military cover backstop for Palmes N. Jr., Chief, Operating Component, SAS. Request for Cover, 9 April 1964. Army Element, (Joint Operations Group) NA. Temporarily for ____ days, effective or Continuing, effective EOD. SUBMIT FORM 642 TO CHANGE LIMITATION CATEGORY TO 3. ASCERTAIN THAT ARMY W-2 BEING ISSUED. SUBMIT FORM 1322 FOR ANY CHANGE AFFECTING THIS COVER. SUBMIT FORM 1323 FOR TRANSFERRING COVER RESPONSIBILITY.
title: NOTIFICATION OF ESTABLISHMENT OF MILITARY COVER BACKSTOP
sender: James A. Franklin, CHIEF, MILITARY COVER, CCO
